title: RIAH FASHION Womens Touch-Screen Gloves - Winter Gloves Warm Lightweight Fleece Driving Smart Phone Touch Tech Glove Leopard
features: ✦RIAH FASHION✦ We offer high quality, stylish fashion accessories & clothing at a very affordable price point. Our talented design team in the USA hand picks and curates a variety of chic, trendy women's apparel & accessories.

You can find beautiful women's apparel, jewelry & accessories for a cocktail party, picnic, work, everday casual, and more. Shopping and styling made easy & simple - we will be your go-to shopping destination!
✦GREAT VALUE✦ Enjoy high-end quality, fashionable clothing for women at a low price point. All our products are thoughtfully designed, well-crafted, lovingly packaged, and delivered state-wide.

✦PERFECT GIFT IDEA✦ Shop great gifts for girlfriend, wife, sister, daughter, mom, bridesmaid, and friends for graduation, birthday, Mother's Day, Christmas, Valentines Day, wedding anniversary, etc. Treat yourself or someone special!

✦PRODUCT DETAILS✦ Super soft and stylish gloves perfect to keep your hands warm and cozy with its inner fleece lining this winter season! These gloves are convenient as they are smart-touch friendly, so you stay warm and connected to your touch-screen devices all at once. Material: 50% Polyester, 50% Cotton. MEASUREMENTS: One Size
